text: Can someone ELI15 what situations ComponentArrays.jl works for? The examples go from a super simple getting started to graduate-level DiffEq example without anything in between.

text:
Its quite nice when working with autodiff packages, because ComponentVectors are just vectors with quite flexible indexing. Try the following for example
```using ComponentArrays
using ForwardDiff
using Zygote

C = ComponentArray(A = rand(2,2), B = rand(2,2))
dist(C) = (C.A .- C.B).^2 |> sum

ForwardDiff.gradient(dist,C)
Zygote.gradient(dist,C)```
